scan_table_check.description: Every scoped app should contain the system property logging.verbosity to define the logging verbosity level. This controls whether gs.debug(), gs.info(), gs.warn() or only gs.error() actually produce log output.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - logging.verbosity system property
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Add the system property "logging.verbosity" to the scoped app as a choice list. Valid choices are "debug", "info", "warn" and "error".
scan_table_check.short_description: Applications should support the logging.verbosity system property
